title: Remove community and gallery sections from homepage

requirements.text: Remove the community section from the HomePage component, including any navigation links, hero text, or call-to-action buttons that reference the community board
acceptanceCriteria: No community-related content appears on the homepage
Navigation does not include community links from the homepage hero section

requirements.text: Remove the gallery section from the HomePage component, including any navigation links, hero text, or call-to-action buttons that reference the gallery
acceptanceCriteria: No gallery-related content appears on the homepage
Navigation does not include gallery links from the homepage hero section

constraints: Only modify the HomePage component; do not remove the Community Board or Gallery pages themselves
Preserve the existing hero section structure and other homepage content
Do not modify navigation components outside of the homepage
nonGoals: Removing the Community Board page (/community route)
Removing community or gallery links from the main navigation menu
Deleting backend functionality for community or gallery features
